text: Paul Sand (born Pablo Sanchez; March 5, 1932) is an American actor and comedian. He was born in Santa Monica, California. He is known for his role as Robert Dreyfuss in the sitcom Friends and Lovers. In 1971, Sand won a Tony Award for Best Performance by a Featured Actor in a Play for his work on Broadway in Paul Sills' Story Theatre and two Drama Desk Awards for Outstanding Performances on Broadway in Story Theatre and Metamorphosis."Paul Sand". title: Paul Sand
